Landing.text: An example app built using Next.js 13 server components.
Landing.subtext: I'm building a web app with Next.js 13 and open sourcing everything. Follow along as we figure this out together.

ConnectPage.email des: Recive an email every time a user submit their answer
ConnectPage.google analytics des: Discover how respondents find and interact with your heyflow. Get the data you need to measure ad campaigns, improve your conversion rate, and more
ConnectPage.google tag manager des: Get even more analytics features for most ambitious data mining demands.
ConnectPage.meta pixel des: The Meta pixel helps you measure customer actions, build audiences and unlock optimization tools.
ConnectPage.Changes to the Google Analytics 4 integr: Changes to the Google Analytics 4 integration will only become active after re-publishing.
